entries.source: Style settings
entries.translated: 样式设置

entries.source: Support development
entries.translated: 支持开发

entries.source: Tip
entries.translated: 提示

entries.source: You can easily navigate through the settings by clicking the icons in the header above.
entries.translated: 您可以通过点击上方标题栏中的图标轻松浏览设置。

entries.source: Some settings below require reopening tabs or reloading the plugin to take effect.
entries.translated: 以下某些设置需要重新打开标签页或重新加载插件才能生效。

entries.source: By allowing PDF++ to modify PDF files directly, you can:
entries.translated: 通过允许PDF++直接修改PDF文件，您可以：

entries.source: Add, edit and delete highlights and links in PDF files.
entries.translated: 在PDF文件中添加、编辑和删除高亮和链接。

entries.source: Add, insert, delete or extract PDF pages and auto-update links.
entries.translated: 添加、插入、删除或提取PDF页面并自动更新链接。

entries.source: Add, rename, move and delete outline items.
entries.translated: 添加、重命名、移动和删除大纲项目。

entries.source: Enable PDF editing
entries.translated: 启用PDF编辑

entries.source: The author assumes no responsibility for any data corruption. Please make sure you have a backup of your files.
entries.translated: 作者对任何数据损坏概不负责。请确保您已备份文件。

entries.source: Annotate PDF files with highlights just by linking to text selection. You can easily copy links to selections using color palette in the toolbar. See the "Color palette" section for the details.
entries.translated: 只需链接到文本选区即可用高亮批注PDF文件。您可以使用工具栏中的调色板轻松复制指向选区的链接。详情请参阅“调色板”部分。

entries.source: Highlight backlinks in PDF viewer
entries.translated: 在PDF查看器中高亮显示反向链接

entries.source: In the PDF viewer, any referenced text will be highlighted for easy identification.
entries.translated: 在PDF查看器中，任何被引用的文本都将被高亮显示以便于识别。

entries.source: Try turning off the following options if you experience performance issues.
entries.translated: 如果遇到性能问题，请尝试关闭以下选项。

entries.source: Highlight backlinks in PDF embeds
entries.translated: 在PDF嵌入中高亮显示反向链接

entries.source: Highlight backlinks in Canvas
entries.translated: 在画布中高亮显示反向链接

entries.source: Highlight backlinks in hover popover previews
entries.translated: 在悬停弹出预览中高亮显示反向链接

entries.source: Highlight style
entries.translated: 高亮样式

entries.source: How backlinks to a text selection should be visualized.
entries.translated: 应如何可视化指向文本选区的反向链接。

entries.source: Highlight
entries.translated: 高亮

entries.source: Underline
entries.translated: 下划线

entries.source: Action when hovering over highlighted text
entries.translated: 悬停在高亮文本上时的操作

entries.source: Easily open backlinks or display a popover preview of it by pressing ctrl (by default) while hovering over a highlighted text in PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 在PDF查看器中悬停在高亮文本上时，通过按Ctrl键（默认）轻松打开反向链接或显示其弹出预览。

entries.source: Open backlink
entries.translated: 打开反向链接

entries.source: Popover preview of backlink
entries.translated: 反向链接的弹出预览

entries.source: Require ctrl key while hovering
entries.translated: 悬停时需要Ctrl键

entries.source: Currently required. You can toggle this on and off in the core Page Preview plugin settings > PDF++: backlink highlights.
entries.translated: 当前为必需。您可以在核心页面预览插件设置 > PDF++：反向链接高亮中切换此功能。

entries.source: Open page preview settings
entries.translated: 打开页面预览设置

entries.source: Double click highlighted text to open the corresponding backlink
entries.translated: 双击高亮文本以打开相应的反向链接

entries.source: How backlinks are opened
entries.translated: 如何打开反向链接

entries.source: Customize how backlinks are opened when double-clicking highlighted text.
entries.translated: 自定义双击高亮文本时如何打开反向链接。

entries.source: How to open the markdown file when no markdown file is opened
entries.translated: 当没有Markdown文件打开时如何打开Markdown文件

entries.source: Current tab
entries.translated: 当前标签页

entries.source: New tab
entries.translated: 新标签页

entries.source: Split right
entries.translated: 右侧拆分

entries.source: Split left
entries.translated: 左侧拆分

entries.source: Split down
entries.translated: 下方拆分

entries.source: Split up
entries.translated: 上方拆分

entries.source: New window
entries.translated: 新窗口

entries.source: Right sidebar
entries.translated: 右侧边栏

entries.source: Left sidebar
entries.translated: 左侧边栏

entries.source: Ignore existing markdown tabs in...
entries.translated: 忽略现有Markdown标签页于...

entries.source: If some notes are opened in the ignored splits, PDF++ will still open the backlink in the way specified in the previous setting. For example, you might want to ignore the left sidebar if you are pinning a certain note (e.g. daily note) in it.
entries.translated: 如果某些笔记在忽略的拆分中打开，PDF++仍将按照先前设置中指定的方式打开反向链接。例如，如果您在左侧边栏中固定了某个笔记（例如每日笔记），您可能希望忽略左侧边栏。

entries.source: Popout windows
entries.translated: 弹出窗口

entries.source: Don't move focus to markdown view after opening a backlink
entries.translated: 打开反向链接后不要将焦点移动到Markdown视图

entries.source: This option will be ignored when you open a link in a tab in the same split as the current tab.
entries.translated: 当您在当前标签页同一拆分中的标签页打开链接时，此选项将被忽略。

entries.source: Colors
entries.translated: 颜色

entries.source: Highlight colors
entries.translated: 高亮颜色

entries.source: You can ues the color palette in PDF toolbars to easily copy links with "&color=..." appended automatically. See the "Color palette" section for the details.
entries.translated: 您可以使用PDF工具栏中的调色板轻松复制自动附加了“&color=...”的链接。详情请参阅“调色板”部分。

entries.source: You can also opt not to use this plugin-dependent notation and apply a single color (the "default highlight color" setting) to all highlights.
entries.translated: 您也可以选择不使用此插件相关的表示法，并将单一颜色（“默认高亮颜色”设置）应用于所有高亮。

entries.source: Highlight a backlink only if a color is specified
entries.translated: 仅当指定颜色时才高亮显示反向链接

entries.source: By default, all backlinks are highlighted. If this option is enabled, a backlink will be highlighted only when a color is specified in the link text.
entries.translated: 默认情况下，所有反向链接都会被高亮显示。如果启用此选项，则仅当链接文本中指定了颜色时，反向链接才会被高亮显示。

entries.source: Default highlight color
entries.translated: 默认高亮颜色

entries.source: If no color is specified in link text, this color will be used.
entries.translated: 如果链接文本中未指定颜色，将使用此颜色。

entries.source: Obsidian default
entries.translated: Obsidian默认

entries.source: Note
entries.translated: 注意

entries.source: Important
entries.translated: 重要

entries.source: Backlink indicator bounding rectangles
entries.translated: 反向链接指示器边界矩形

entries.source: Show bounding rectangles for backlinked annotations
entries.translated: 显示带反向链接的批注的边界矩形

entries.source: Bounding rectangles will be shown for annotations with backlinks.
entries.translated: 将显示带反向链接的批注的边界矩形。

entries.source: Backlink indicator icons
entries.translated: 反向链接指示器图标

entries.source: Show icons for text selections, annotations, offsets and rectangular selections with backlinks.
entries.translated: 显示带反向链接的文本选区、批注、偏移和矩形选区的图标。

entries.source: Show icon for text selection with backlinks
entries.translated: 显示带反向链接的文本选区的图标

entries.source: Show icon for annotation with backlinks
entries.translated: 显示带反向链接的批注的图标

entries.source: Show icon for offset backlinks
entries.translated: 显示偏移反向链接的图标

entries.source: Show icon for rectangular selection backlinks
entries.translated: 显示矩形选区反向链接的图标

entries.source: Icon size
entries.translated: 图标大小

entries.source: Paste as image
entries.translated: 粘贴为图像

entries.source: By default, rectangular selection embeds are re-rendered every time you open the markdown file, which can slow down the loading time. Turn on this option to replace them with static images and improve the performance.
entries.translated: 默认情况下，矩形选区嵌入每次打开Markdown文件时都会重新渲染，这可能会减慢加载时间。启用此选项可将它们替换为静态图像以提高性能。

entries.source: Follow "adapt to theme" setting
entries.translated: 遵循“适应主题”设置

entries.source: If enabled, rectangular selection embeds will be inverted in color when the "Adapt to theme" setting is enabled in the PDF toolbar. This will help you reduce eye strain in dark mode.
entries.translated: 如果启用，当PDF工具栏中的“适应主题”设置启用时，矩形选区嵌入的颜色将被反转。这将有助于您在深色模式下减轻眼睛疲劳。

entries.source: Rendering resolution
entries.translated: 渲染分辨率

entries.source: The higher the value, the better the rendering quality, but the longer time it takes to render. The default value is 100.
entries.translated: 数值越高，渲染质量越好，但渲染所需时间越长。默认值为100。

entries.source: Include the selected color's name when copying a link to a rectangular selection
entries.translated: 复制矩形选区链接时包含所选颜色的名称

entries.source: When enabled, the name of the color selected in the color palette will be included in the link text. As a result, the rectangular selection will be highlighted with the specified color in the PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 启用后，调色板中选中的颜色名称将包含在链接文本中。这样，PDF查看器中的矩形选区将以指定颜色高亮显示。

entries.source: Zoom to fit rectangular selection when opening link
entries.translated: 打开链接时缩放以适合矩形选区

entries.source: Use PDF++ callouts
entries.translated: 使用PDF++标注

entries.source: Callout type name
entries.translated: 标注类型名称

entries.source: For example, if this is set to "PDF", use the following syntax to insert a callout with color "yellow":
entries.translated: 例如，如果此项设置为“PDF”，则使用以下语法插入颜色为“黄色”的标注：

entries.source: Callout icon
entries.translated: 标注图标

entries.source: Hoverable dropdown menus
entries.translated: 可悬停下拉菜单

entries.source: (Not supported on smartphones) When enabled, the dropdown menus (⌄) in the PDF toolbar will be opened by hovering over the icon, and you don't need to click it.
entries.translated: （智能手机不支持）启用后，PDF工具栏中的下拉菜单（⌄）将通过悬停在图标上打开，无需点击。

entries.source: Show zoom level box
entries.translated: 显示缩放级别框

entries.source: A input box will be added to the PDF toolbar, which indicated the current zoom level and allows you to set the zoom level by typing a number.
entries.translated: 将在PDF工具栏中添加一个输入框，用于指示当前缩放级别并允许通过输入数字设置缩放级别。

entries.source: Color palette
entries.translated: 调色板

entries.source: Clicking a color while selecting a range of text will copy a link to the selection with "&color=..." appended.
entries.translated: 选择文本范围时点击颜色将复制带有“&color=...”附加的选区链接。

entries.source: Show color palette in the toolbar
entries.translated: 在工具栏中显示调色板

entries.source: A color palette will be added to the toolbar of the PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 调色板将添加到PDF查看器的工具栏中。

entries.source: Show "without specifying color" button in the color palette
entries.translated: 在调色板中显示“不指定颜色”按钮

entries.source: Show color palette in PDF embeds as well
entries.translated: 在PDF嵌入中也显示调色板

entries.source: Default color selected in color palette
entries.translated: 调色板中默认选中的颜色

entries.source: This color will be selected in the color palette in a newly opened PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 此颜色将在新打开的PDF查看器的调色板中被选中。

entries.source: Don't specify
entries.translated: 不指定

entries.source: Share a single color among all color palettes
entries.translated: 在所有调色板间共享单一颜色

entries.source: If disabled, you can specify a different color for each color palette.
entries.translated: 如果禁用，您可以为每个调色板指定不同的颜色。

entries.source: Share the color with newly opened color palettes as well
entries.translated: 也与新打开的调色板共享颜色

entries.source: Quiet tooltips in color palette
entries.translated: 调色板中的静默工具提示

entries.source: When disabled (default), the tooltip will show the color name as well as the selected copy format and display text format. If enabled, only the color name will be shown.
entries.translated: 禁用时（默认），工具提示将显示颜色名称以及选中的复制格式和显示文本格式。启用后，仅显示颜色名称。

entries.source: Default zoom level
entries.translated: 默认缩放级别

entries.source: This option will be ignored in PDF embeds.
entries.translated: 此选项在PDF嵌入中将被忽略。

entries.source: Fit width
entries.translated: 适合宽度

entries.source: Fit height
entries.translated: 适合高度

entries.source: Fit page
entries.translated: 适合页面

entries.source: Custom...
entries.translated: 自定义...

entries.source: Custom zoom level (%)
entries.translated: 自定义缩放级别（%）

entries.source: Default scroll mode
entries.translated: 默认滚动模式

entries.source: Wrapped
entries.translated: 换行

entries.source: In-page
entries.translated: 页面内

entries.source: Default spread mode
entries.translated: 默认跨页模式

entries.source: Single page
entries.translated: 单页

entries.source: Two page (odd)
entries.translated: 双页（奇数）

entries.source: Two page (even)
entries.translated: 双页（偶数）

entries.source: Use PageUp/PageDown key to go to previous/next page
entries.translated: 使用PageUp/PageDown键转到上一页/下一页

entries.source: (Desktop & tablet only) Customize the behavior of the context menu that pops up when you right-click in the PDF viewer. For mobile users, see also the next section.
entries.translated: （仅限桌面和平板电脑）自定义在PDF查看器中右键单击时弹出的上下文菜单行为。移动用户请参阅下一节。

entries.source: Replace the built-in context menu with PDF++'s custom menu
entries.translated: 用PDF++的自定义菜单替换内置上下文菜单

entries.source: Show context menu on tablet devices as well
entries.translated: 在平板设备上也显示上下文菜单

entries.source: By default, Obsidian does not show the context menu after text selection on mobile devices, including tablets (iPad, etc.). If you want to show the context menu on tablets, turn this option on. Even if this option is turned off, you copy select the OS-native "Copy" option to run the "Copy link to selection or annotation" command.
entries.translated: 默认情况下，Obsidian在移动设备（包括平板电脑如iPad等）上选择文本后不显示上下文菜单。如果您想在平板电脑上显示上下文菜单，请开启此选项。即使此选项关闭，您也可以选择操作系统原生的“复制”选项来运行“复制选区或标注链接”命令。

entries.source: Show the context menu right after selecting text when...
entries.translated: 在以下情况下选择文本后立即显示上下文菜单...

entries.source: Ctrl key is pressed
entries.translated: Ctrl键被按下

entries.source: Win key is pressed
entries.translated: Win键被按下

entries.source: Shift key is pressed
entries.translated: Shift键被按下

entries.source: Alt key is pressed
entries.translated: Alt键被按下

entries.source: Menu items
entries.translated: 菜单项

entries.source: Customize which menu items to show.
entries.translated: 自定义要显示的菜单项。

entries.source: Look up "(selection)"
entries.translated: 查找“（选区）”

entries.source: Available only on macOS.
entries.translated: 仅在macOS上可用。

entries.source: Copy link to selection
entries.translated: 复制选区链接

entries.source: Add highlight to file
entries.translated: 向文件添加高亮

entries.source: Copy link to annotation
entries.translated: 复制标注链接

entries.source: Edit/delete annotation
entries.translated: 编辑/删除标注

entries.source: Copy PDF link / Search on Google Scholar / Paste copied PDF link to selection / Copy URL
entries.translated: 复制PDF链接 / 在Google学术上搜索 / 将复制的PDF链接粘贴到选区 / 复制URL

entries.source: "Search on Google Scholar": Available when right-clicking citation links in PDFs.
entries.translated: “在Google学术上搜索”：在PDF中右键单击引用链接时可用。

entries.source: Copy selected text / Copy annotated text
entries.translated: 复制选中的文本 / 复制标注的文本

entries.source: Copy link to search
entries.translated: 复制搜索链接

entries.source: Read aloud selected text
entries.translated: 朗读选中的文本

entries.source: Copy link to page
entries.translated: 复制页面链接

entries.source: Available when right-clicking with no text selected.
entries.translated: 在未选中文本时右键单击可用。

entries.source: Customize menu...
entries.translated: 自定义菜单...

entries.source: Customize nested menus.
entries.translated: 自定义嵌套菜单。

entries.source: Top-level menu
entries.translated: 顶级菜单

entries.source: Copy format
entries.translated: 复制格式

entries.source: Display text format
entries.translated: 显示文本格式

entries.source: Submenu
entries.translated: 子菜单

entries.source: Subsubmenu
entries.translated: 子子菜单

entries.source: Update color palette from context menu
entries.translated: 从上下文菜单更新调色板

entries.source: In the context menu, the items (color, copy format and display text format) set in the color palette are selected by default. If this option is enabled, selecting a menu item will also update the color palette state and hence the default-selected items in the context menu as well. Even if this option is enabled, you can prevent the color palette from being updated by holding down the Ctrl key while selecting the menu item.
entries.translated: 在上下文菜单中，默认选中调色板中设置的项（颜色、复制格式和显示文本格式）。如果启用此选项，选择菜单项也会更新调色板状态，从而更新上下文菜单中默认选中的项。即使启用此选项，您也可以通过在选择菜单项时按住Ctrl键来防止调色板被更新。

entries.source: Action triggered by selecting "Copy" option on mobile devices
entries.translated: 在移动设备上选择“复制”选项时触发的操作

entries.source: Copy text
entries.translated: 复制文本

entries.source: Obsidian default (copy as quote)
entries.translated: Obsidian默认（复制为引用）

entries.source: Run PDF++'s copy command
entries.translated: 运行PDF++的复制命令

entries.source: Set up hotkeys for copying links
entries.translated: 设置复制链接的热键

entries.source: PDF++ offers two commands for quickly copying links via hotkeys.
entries.translated: PDF++提供两个命令，用于通过热键快速复制链接。

entries.source: After running this command, you can add the copied link to the PDF file itself: select a range of text, right-click, and then click "Paste copied link to selection".
entries.translated: 运行此命令后，您可以将复制的链接添加到PDF文件本身：选择文本范围，右键单击，然后点击“将复制的链接粘贴到选区”。

entries.source: Open hotkeys settings
entries.translated: 打开热键设置

entries.source: Further workflow enhancements
entries.translated: 进一步的工作流增强

entries.source: PDF++ also offers the following commands for reducing mouse clicks on the PDF toolbar by assigning hotkeys to them.
entries.translated: PDF++还提供以下命令，通过为它们分配热键来减少PDF工具栏上的鼠标点击。

entries.source: And more...
entries.translated: 以及更多...

entries.source: Show outline: when the active file is not PDF, run the core Outline plugin's "Show outline" command
entries.translated: 显示大纲：当活动文件不是PDF时，运行核心大纲插件的“显示大纲”命令

entries.source: By turning this on, you can use the same hotkey to show the outline of a markdown file and a PDF file without key conflict.
entries.translated: 开启此选项后，您可以使用相同的热键显示Markdown文件和PDF文件的大纲，而不会发生键冲突。

entries.source: Show outline / show thumbnail: close the sidebar if it is already open
entries.translated: 显示大纲/显示缩略图：如果侧边栏已打开则关闭

entries.source: Enabling this will allow you to use the same hotkey to close the sidebar if it is already open.
entries.translated: 启用此功能后，您可以使用相同的热键在侧边栏已打开时将其关闭。

entries.source: Zoom in / zoom out: when the active file is not PDF, run the built-in "Zoom in" / "Zoom out" command
entries.translated: 放大/缩小：当活动文件不是PDF时，运行内置的“放大”/“缩小”命令

entries.source: By turning this on, you can use the same hotkey to zoom in/out a PDF viewer or any other type of view without key conflict.
entries.translated: 开启此选项后，您可以使用相同的热键放大/缩小PDF查看器或任何其他类型的视图，而不会发生键冲突。

entries.source: Zoom in / zoom out: when the active file is not PDF, run Font Size Adjuster's "Increment font size" / "Decrement font size" command
entries.translated: 放大/缩小：当活动文件不是PDF时，运行字体大小调整器的“增加字体大小”/“减小字体大小”命令

entries.source: The template format that will be used when copying a link to a selection or an annotation in PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 在PDF查看器中复制选区或标注链接时将使用的模板格式。

entries.source: Available variables are:
entries.translated: 可用变量有：

entries.source: Additionally, you have access to the following variables when the PDF file has a corresponding markdown file specified via the "PDF" property(see the "Property to associate a markdown file to a PDF file" setting below):
entries.translated: 此外，当PDF文件通过“PDF”属性指定了对应的markdown文件时（请参见下方的“将markdown文件关联到PDF文件的属性”设置），您还可以访问以下变量：

entries.source: The following variables are deprecated and will be removed in the near future
entries.translated: 以下变量已弃用，将在不久的将来移除

entries.source: Property to associate a markdown file to a PDF file
entries.translated: 将markdown文件关联到PDF文件的属性

entries.source: Remarks:
entries.translated: 备注：

entries.source: If you are in Source Mode, be sure to enclose the link in double quotes.
entries.translated: 如果您处于源代码模式，请务必将链接用双引号括起来。

entries.source: This format will be also used when copying a link to a selection or an annotation from the context menu.
entries.translated: 从上下文菜单复制选择或注释的链接时，也将使用此格式。

entries.source: Default display text format
entries.translated: 默认显示文本格式

entries.source: Title & page
entries.translated: 标题和页码

entries.source: Page
entries.translated: 页码

entries.source: Text
entries.translated: 文本

entries.source: Emoji
entries.translated: 表情符号

entries.source: Share a single display text format among all PDF viewers
entries.translated: 在所有PDF查看器之间共享单一显示文本格式

entries.source: If disabled, you can specify a different display text format for each PDF viewer from the dropdown menu in the PDF toolbar.
entries.translated: 如果禁用，您可以从PDF工具栏的下拉菜单中为每个PDF查看器指定不同的显示文本格式。

entries.source: Share the display text format with newly opened PDF viewers as well
entries.translated: 同时与新打开的PDF查看器共享显示文本格式

entries.source: Custom copy formats
entries.translated: 自定义复制格式

entries.source: Customize the format to use when you copy a link by clicking a color palette item or running the commands while selecting a range of text in PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 自定义在PDF查看器中点击调色板项目或运行命令时复制链接所使用的格式。

entries.source: In addition to the variables listed above, here you can use
entries.translated: 除了上面列出的变量外，这里您还可以使用

entries.source: Default action when clicking on color palette
entries.translated: 点击调色板时的默认操作

entries.source: Quote
entries.translated: 引用

entries.source: Link
entries.translated: 链接

entries.source: Embed
entries.translated: 嵌入

entries.source: Callout
entries.translated: 标注

entries.source: Quote in callout
entries.translated: 标注中的引用

entries.source: Share a single action among all PDF viewers
entries.translated: 在所有PDF查看器之间共享单一操作

entries.source: If disabled, you can specify a different action for each PDF viewer from the dropdown menu in the PDF toolbar.
entries.translated: 如果禁用，您可以从PDF工具栏的下拉菜单中为每个PDF查看器指定不同的操作。

entries.source: Share the action with newly opened PDF viewers as well
entries.translated: 同时与新打开的PDF查看器共享操作

entries.source: Use another template when no text is selected
entries.translated: 未选择文本时使用另一个模板

entries.source: For example, you can use this to copy a link to the page when there is no selection.
entries.translated: 例如，您可以使用此功能在没有选择时复制页面链接。

entries.source: Speed up the process of copying & pasting PDF links to your notes with some automation. Note that you can't activate both of auto-focus and auto-paste at the same time.
entries.translated: 通过一些自动化功能加速将PDF链接复制粘贴到笔记中的过程。请注意，您不能同时启用自动聚焦和自动粘贴。

entries.source: Auto-copy
entries.translated: 自动复制

entries.source: If enabled, the "Copy link to selection or annotation" command will be triggered automatically every time you select a range of text in a PDF viewer, meaning you don't even have to press a hotkey to copy a link.
entries.translated: 如果启用，“复制选择或注释的链接”命令将在每次您在PDF查看器中选择文本范围时自动触发，这意味着您甚至无需按快捷键即可复制链接。

entries.source: Enable
entries.translated: 启用

entries.source: You can also toggle auto-focus via an icon in the left ribbon menu if the next setting is enabled.
entries.translated: 如果启用了下一个设置，您还可以通过左侧功能区菜单中的图标切换自动聚焦。

entries.source: Show an icon to toggle auto-copy in the left ribbon menu
entries.translated: 在左侧功能区菜单中显示用于切换自动复制的图标

entries.source: You can also toggle this mode via a command. Reload the plugin after changing this setting to take effect.
entries.translated: 您也可以通过命令切换此模式。更改此设置后重新加载插件以使其生效。

entries.source: Icon name
entries.translated: 图标名称

entries.source: Auto-focus
entries.translated: 自动聚焦

entries.source: If enabled, a markdown file will be focused automatically after copying a link to PDF text selection or annotation.
entries.translated: 如果启用，复制PDF文本选择或注释的链接后，将自动聚焦到一个markdown文件。

entries.source: Recommended if you prefer something less agressive than auto-paste. You can also toggle auto-focus via an icon in the left ribbon menu if the next setting is enabled.
entries.translated: 如果您喜欢比自动粘贴更温和的方式，推荐使用。如果启用了下一个设置，您还可以通过左侧功能区菜单中的图标切换自动聚焦。

entries.source: Show an icon to toggle auto-focus in the left ribbon menu
entries.translated: 在左侧功能区菜单中显示用于切换自动聚焦的图标

entries.source: You can also toggle auto-focus via a command. Reload the plugin after changing this setting to take effect.
entries.translated: 您也可以通过命令切换自动聚焦。更改此设置后重新加载插件以使其生效。

entries.source: Target markdown file to focus on
entries.translated: 要聚焦的目标markdown文件

entries.source: Last pasted .md
entries.translated: 上次粘贴的.md

entries.source: Last active .md
entries.translated: 上次活动的.md

entries.source: Last active & open .md
entries.translated: 上次活动且打开的.md

entries.source: Last pasted .md if any, otherwise last active .md
entries.translated: 如果有上次粘贴的.md，否则使用上次活动的.md

entries.source: Last pasted .md if any, otherwise last active & open .md
entries.translated: 如果有上次粘贴的.md，否则使用上次活动且打开的.md

entries.source: Last active & open .md if any, otherwise last pasted .md
entries.translated: 如果有上次活动且打开的.md，否则使用上次粘贴的.md

entries.source: Auto-paste
entries.translated: 自动粘贴

entries.source: If enabled, the copied link to PDF text selection or annotation will be automatically pasted into a markdown file right after copying.
entries.translated: 如果启用，复制的PDF文本选择或注释链接将在复制后自动粘贴到markdown文件中。

entries.source: You can also toggle auto-paste via an icon in the left ribbon menu if the next setting is enabled.
entries.translated: 如果启用了下一个设置，您还可以通过左侧功能区菜单中的图标切换自动粘贴。

entries.source: Show an icon to toggle auto-paste in the left ribbon menu
entries.translated: 在左侧功能区菜单中显示用于切换自动粘贴的图标

entries.source: You can also toggle auto-paste via a command. Reload the plugin after changing this setting to take effect.
entries.translated: 您也可以通过命令切换自动粘贴。更改此设置后重新加载插件以使其生效。

entries.source: Target markdown file to paste links to
entries.translated: 要粘贴链接的目标markdown文件

entries.source: Focus editor after auto-pasting
entries.translated: 自动粘贴后聚焦编辑器

entries.source: If enabled, auto-paste will focus on the editor after pasting.
entries.translated: 如果启用，自动粘贴将在粘贴后聚焦编辑器。

entries.source: Clear text selection after auto-pasting
entries.translated: 自动粘贴后清除文本选择

entries.source: If enabled, the text selection in the PDF viewer will be automatically cleared after performing auto-pasting.
entries.translated: 如果启用，执行自动粘贴后，PDF查看器中的文本选择将自动清除。

entries.source: Respect current cursor position
entries.translated: 尊重当前光标位置

entries.source: When enabled, triggering auto-pasting will paste the copied text at the current cursor position if the target note is already opened. If disabled, the text will be always appended to the end of the note.
entries.translated: 启用后，如果目标笔记已打开，触发自动粘贴将在当前光标位置粘贴复制的文本。如果禁用，文本将始终附加到笔记末尾。

entries.source: Blank line above the appended content
entries.translated: 附加内容上方的空行

entries.source: Because you disabled the option above, auto-pasted content will be added at the end of your note. Enable this option to make sure that you have a blank line between the existing content and the newly added content.
entries.translated: 由于您禁用了上述选项，自动粘贴的内容将添加到笔记末尾。启用此选项可确保现有内容与新添加内容之间有空行。

entries.source: General
entries.translated: 通用

entries.source: General settings that apply to both auto-focus and auto-paste.
entries.translated: 适用于自动聚焦和自动粘贴的通用设置。

entries.source: Open target markdown file if not opened
entries.translated: 如果未打开，则打开目标markdown文件

entries.source: How to open target markdown file when not opened
entries.translated: 未打开时如何打开目标markdown文件

entries.source: Hover Editor
entries.translated: 悬停编辑器

entries.source: Close Hover Editor when it loses focus
entries.translated: 悬停编辑器失去焦点时关闭

entries.source: This option will not affect the behavior of Hover Editor outside of PDF++.
entries.translated: 此选项不会影响PDF++之外悬停编辑器的行为。

entries.source: Auto-hide sidebar when it loses focus after auto-pasting
entries.translated: 自动粘贴后侧边栏失去焦点时自动隐藏

entries.source: After auto-pasting into a markdown file opened in the left or right sidebar, the sidebar will be automatically collapsed once it loses focus.
entries.translated: 自动粘贴到左侧或右侧边栏中打开的markdown文件后，侧边栏一旦失去焦点将自动折叠。

entries.source: Always open in editing view
entries.translated: 始终在编辑视图中打开

entries.source: This option can be useful especially when you set the previous option to "Hover Editor".
entries.translated: 此选项尤其当您将上一个选项设置为“悬停编辑器”时可能有用。

entries.source: Execute command when target file cannot be determined
entries.translated: 无法确定目标文件时执行命令

entries.source: When PDF++ cannot determine which markdown file to focus on or paste to, it will execute the command specified in the next option to let you pick a target file.
entries.translated: 当PDF++无法确定要聚焦或粘贴到哪个markdown文件时，它将执行下一个选项中指定的命令，让您选择目标文件。

entries.source: Command to execute
entries.translated: 要执行的命令

entries.source: Here's some examples of useful commands:
entries.translated: 以下是一些有用命令的示例：

entries.source: 新建笔记
entries.translated: 新建笔记

entries.source: 在右侧创建笔记
entries.translated: 在右侧创建笔记

entries.source: 快速切换: 打开快速切换
entries.translated: 快速切换：打开快速切换

entries.source: [Auto-paste] Maximum time to wait for the command to open the target file (sec)
entries.translated: [自动粘贴] 等待命令打开目标文件的最长时间（秒）

entries.source: The link will be auto-pasted into the first markdown file that you open within this time frame after the command is executed. If you don't open any markdown file during this time, the auto-paste will not occur. This option is not related to auto-focus.
entries.translated: 链接将在命令执行后在此时间范围内打开的第一个markdown文件中自动粘贴。如果您在此期间未打开任何markdown文件，则不会发生自动粘贴。此选项与自动聚焦无关。

entries.source: The "PDF++: Create new note for auto-focus or auto-paste" command
entries.translated: “PDF++：为自动聚焦或自动粘贴创建新笔记”命令

entries.source: Creates a new note and opens it in a new pane specified in the "How to open target markdown file when not opened" option.
entries.translated: 创建一个新笔记，并在“未打开时如何打开目标markdown文件”选项中指定的新窗格中打开它。

entries.source: New note title format
entries.translated: 新笔记标题格式

entries.source: See
entries.translated: 参见

entries.source: for the details about these variables.
entries.translated: 了解这些变量的详细信息。

entries.source: Template file path
entries.translated: 模板文件路径

entries.source: Example:
entries.translated: 示例：

entries.source: Drag & drop annotation popup to insert a link to the annotation
entries.translated: 拖放注释弹窗以插入注释链接

entries.source: Note that turning on this option disables text selection in the annotation popup (e.g. modified date, author, etc).
entries.translated: 请注意，启用此选项会禁用注释弹窗中的文本选择功能（例如修改日期、作者等）。

entries.source: If an annotation has a comment, show the annotation popup on hover
entries.translated: 如果注释有评论，悬停时显示注释弹窗

entries.source: This is the same behavior as the PDF viewers of some web browsers (e.g. Chrome/Firefox). You may have to reopen the PDF file after changing this option.
entries.translated: 这与某些网页浏览器（例如Chrome/Firefox）的PDF查看器行为相同。更改此选项后，您可能需要重新打开PDF文件。

entries.source: Render markdown in annotation popups when the annotation has text contents
entries.translated: 当注释包含文本内容时，在注释弹窗中渲染Markdown

entries.source: Make it easier to work with internal links embedded in PDF files.
entries.translated: 使处理PDF文件中嵌入的内部链接更加容易。

entries.source: You may want to turn this off to avoid conflicts with hover+ctrl.Reopen tabs or reload the app after changing this option.
entries.translated: 您可能需要关闭此选项以避免与悬停+Ctrl冲突。更改此选项后，请重新打开标签页或重新加载应用。

entries.source: Show a popover preview of PDF internal links by hover(+ctrl)
entries.translated: 通过悬停(+Ctrl)显示PDF内部链接的弹窗预览

entries.source: Currently required. You can toggle this on and off in the core Page Preview plugin settings > PDF++: internal links in PDF (except for citations).
entries.translated: 当前必需。您可以在核心页面预览插件设置 > PDF++：PDF内部链接（引用除外）中切换此选项。

entries.source: Enable history navigation for PDF internal links
entries.translated: 启用PDF内部链接的历史导航

entries.source: When enabled, clicking the "navigate back" (left arrow) button will take you back to the page you were originally viewing before clicking on an internal link in the PDF file.
entries.translated: 启用后，点击“导航返回”（左箭头）按钮将带您回到点击PDF文件中内部链接之前正在查看的页面。

entries.source: Copy PDF link as Obsidian link
entries.translated: 将PDF链接复制为Obsidian链接

entries.source: (Requires custom context menu enabled) In the PDF viewer, right-click a PDF-embedded link and then click "Copy PDF link as Obsidian link". It will copy the PDF link as an Obsidian link that you can paste into markdown files. Clicking the pasted link will take you to the same destination as the original PDF link.
entries.translated: （需要启用自定义上下文菜单）在PDF查看器中，右键点击PDF嵌入的链接，然后点击“将PDF链接复制为Obsidian链接”。它会将PDF链接复制为Obsidian链接，您可以粘贴到Markdown文件中。点击粘贴的链接将带您到与原始PDF链接相同的目的地。

entries.source: "Copy link to current page view" command
entries.translated: “复制当前页面视图链接”命令

entries.source: Running this command while viewing a PDF file will copy a link, clicking which will open the PDF file at the current scroll position and zoom level.
entries.translated: 在查看PDF文件时运行此命令将复制一个链接，点击该链接将在当前滚动位置和缩放级别打开PDF文件。

entries.source: Paste copied link to a text selection in a PDF file
entries.translated: 将复制的链接粘贴到PDF文件中的文本选择

entries.source: (Requires custom context menu & PDF editing enabled) After copying a link by the above actions, you can "paste" it to a selection in PDF to create a PDF internal link. To do this, right-click the selection and click "Paste copied link to selection".
entries.translated: （需要启用自定义上下文菜单和PDF编辑功能）通过上述操作复制链接后，您可以将其“粘贴”到PDF中的选择以创建PDF内部链接。为此，右键点击选择并点击“将复制的链接粘贴到选择”。

entries.source: The current implementation is based on some pretty primitive hand-crafted rules, and there is a lot of room for improvement. Code contribution is much appreciated!
entries.translated: 当前实现基于一些相当原始的手工规则，有很大的改进空间。非常欢迎代码贡献！

entries.source: Hover(+ctrl) on a citation link to show...
entries.translated: 悬停(+Ctrl)在引用链接上以显示...

entries.source: Same as other internal links
entries.translated: 与其他内部链接相同

entries.source: PDF++'s custom bibliography popover
entries.translated: PDF++的自定义参考文献弹窗

entries.source: Google Scholar popover
entries.translated: Google Scholar弹窗

entries.source: Currently not required. You can toggle this on and off in the core Page Preview plugin settings > PDF++: citation links in PDF.
entries.translated: 当前非必需。您可以在核心页面预览插件设置 > PDF++：PDF中的引用链接中切换此选项。

entries.source: AnyStyle path
entries.translated: AnyStyle路径

entries.source: Citation ID patterns
entries.translated: 引用ID模式

entries.source: You don't need to care about this option in most use cases - just leave it to the default value. For advanced users: most internal links in PDF files use so-called destination names to specify the target location. This option allows you to specify the regular expressions (separated by line breaks) that determine whether a given internal link is a citation link based on the dsetination name.
entries.translated: 在大多数使用情况下，您不需要关心此选项 - 只需保留默认值。对于高级用户：PDF文件中的大多数内部链接使用所谓的目标名称来指定目标位置。此选项允许您指定正则表达式（以换行符分隔），根据目标名称确定给定的内部链接是否为引用链接。

entries.source: Enable bibliography extraction in PDF embeds
entries.translated: 在PDF嵌入中启用参考文献提取

entries.source: Enable bibliography extraction in Canvas
entries.translated: 在Canvas中启用参考文献提取

entries.source: Enable bibliography extraction in hover popover previews
entries.translated: 在悬停弹窗预览中启用参考文献提取

entries.source: Make it easier to work with external links embedded in PDF files.
entries.translated: 使处理PDF文件中嵌入的外部链接更加容易。

entries.source: Show a popover preview of external links by hover(+ctrl)
entries.translated: 通过悬停(+Ctrl)显示外部链接的弹窗预览

entries.source: Currently required. You can toggle this on and off in the core Page Preview plugin settings > PDF++: external links in PDF.
entries.translated: 当前必需。您可以在核心页面预览插件设置 > PDF++：PDF中的外部链接中切换此选项。

entries.source: General settings for the PDF sidebar. The options specific to the outline and thumbnails are located in the corresponding sections below.
entries.translated: PDF侧边栏的通用设置。大纲和缩略图特有的选项位于下面的相应部分。

entries.source: Click on PDF content to hide sidebar
entries.translated: 点击PDF内容以隐藏侧边栏

entries.source: Requires reopening the tabs after changing this option.
entries.translated: 更改此选项后需要重新打开标签页。

entries.source: Default sidebar view
entries.translated: 默认侧边栏视图

entries.source: Reopen PDFs after changing this option.
entries.translated: 更改此选项后重新打开PDF。

entries.source: Thumbnails
entries.translated: 缩略图

entries.source: Outline
entries.translated: 大纲

entries.source: Power up the outline view of the built-in PDF viewer: add, rename, or delete items via the right-click menu and the "Add to outline" command, drag & drop items to insert a section link, and more.
entries.translated: 增强内置PDF查看器的大纲视图：通过右键菜单和“添加到大纲”命令添加、重命名或删除项目，拖放项目以插入章节链接，等等。

entries.source: Show popover preview by hover(+ctrl)
entries.translated: 通过悬停(+Ctrl)显示弹窗预览

entries.source: Reopen tabs or reload the app after changing this option.
entries.translated: 更改此选项后，请重新打开标签页或重新加载应用。

entries.source: Currently required. You can toggle this on and off in the core Page Preview plugin settings > PDF++: outlines (bookmarks).
entries.translated: 当前必需。您可以在核心页面预览插件设置 > PDF++：大纲（书签）中切换此选项。

entries.source: Record to history when clicking an outline item
entries.translated: 点击大纲项目时记录到历史

entries.source: Replace the built-in context menu in the outline with a custom one
entries.translated: 用自定义上下文菜单替换大纲中的内置上下文菜单

entries.source: This enables you to insert a section link with a custom format by right-clicking an item in the outline. Moreover, you will be able to add, rename, or delete outline items if PDF modification is enabled.
entries.translated: 这使您能够通过右键点击大纲中的项目来插入具有自定义格式的章节链接。此外，如果启用了PDF修改功能，您将能够添加、重命名或删除大纲项目。

entries.source: Drag & drop outline item to insert link to section
entries.translated: 拖放大纲项目以插入章节链接

entries.source: Grab an item in the outline and drop it to a markdown file to insert a section link. Changing this option requires reopening the tabs or reloading the app.
entries.translated: 抓住大纲中的项目并将其拖放到Markdown文件中以插入章节链接。更改此选项需要重新打开标签页或重新加载应用。

entries.source: Copy outline as markdown
entries.translated: 将大纲复制为Markdown

entries.source: You can copy PDF outline as a markdown list or headings using the commands "Copy outline as markdown list" and "Copy outline as markdown headings".
entries.translated: 您可以使用命令“将大纲复制为Markdown列表”和“将大纲复制为Markdown标题”将PDF大纲复制为Markdown列表或标题。

entries.source: List: display text format
entries.translated: 列表：显示文本格式

entries.source: List: copy format
entries.translated: 列表：复制格式

entries.source: You don't need to include leading hyphens in the template.
entries.translated: 您不需要在模板中包含前导连字符。

entries.source: Headings: display text format
entries.translated: 标题：显示文本格式

entries.source: Headings: copy format
entries.translated: 标题：复制格式

entries.source: You don't need to include leading hashes in the template.
entries.translated: 您不需要在模板中包含前导井号。

entries.source: Headings: minimum level
entries.translated: 标题：最小级别

entries.source: The copied headings will start at this level.
entries.translated: 复制的标题将从此级别开始。

entries.source: You may want to turn this off to avoid conflicts with hover+ctrlReopen tabs or reload the app after changing this option.
entries.translated: 您可能需要关闭此选项以避免与悬停+Ctrl冲突。更改此选项后，请重新打开标签页或重新加载应用。

entries.source: Currently required. You can toggle this on and off in the core Page Preview plugin settings > PDF++: thumbnails.
entries.translated: 当前必需。您可以在核心页面预览插件设置 > PDF++：缩略图中切换此选项。

entries.source: Record to history when clicking a thumbnail
entries.translated: 点击缩略图时记录到历史

entries.source: Replace the built-in context menu in thumbnails with a custom one
entries.translated: 用自定义上下文菜单替换缩略图中的内置上下文菜单

entries.source: This enables you to copy a page link with a custom display text format specified in the PDF toolbar by right-clicking a thumbnail. Moreover, you will be able to insert, delete, extract pages if PDF modification is enabled.
entries.translated: 这使您能够通过右键点击缩略图来复制具有PDF工具栏中指定的自定义显示文本格式的页面链接。此外，如果启用了PDF修改功能，您将能够插入、删除、提取页面。

entries.source: Drag & drop PDF thumbnail to insert link to page
entries.translated: 拖放PDF缩略图以插入页面链接

entries.source: Grab a thumbnail image and drop it to a markdown file to insert a page link. Changing this option requires reopening the tabs or reloading the app.
entries.translated: 抓住缩略图图像并将其拖放到Markdown文件中以插入页面链接。更改此选项需要重新打开标签页或重新加载应用。

entries.source: Note: When disabled, drag-and-drop will cause the thumbnail image to be paste as a data url, which is seemingly Obsidian's bug.
entries.translated: 注意：禁用时，拖放将导致缩略图图像粘贴为数据URL，这似乎是Obsidian的错误。

entries.source: Always warn when deleting a page
entries.translated: 删除页面时始终警告

entries.source: Warn when deleting a page with backlinks
entries.translated: 删除有反向链接的页面时警告

entries.source: Remove the extracted pages from the original PDF by default
entries.translated: 默认从原始PDF中移除提取的页面

entries.source: Ask whether to remove the extracted pages from the original PDF before extracting
entries.translated: 提取前询问是否从原始PDF中移除提取的页面

entries.source: Open extracted PDF file
entries.translated: 打开提取的PDF文件

entries.source: If enabled, the newly created PDF file will be opened after running the commands "Extract this page to a new file" or "Divide this PDF into two files at this page".
entries.translated: 如果启用，运行命令“将此页面提取到新文件”或“在此页面处将此PDF分成两个文件”后，新创建的PDF文件将被打开。

entries.source: How to open
entries.translated: 如何打开

entries.source: Page labels
entries.translated: 页面标签

entries.source: You can also modify page labels directly using the command "Edit page labels".
entries.translated: 您也可以直接使用命令“编辑页面标签”来修改页面标签。

entries.source: Insert: default page label processing
entries.translated: 插入：默认页面标签处理

entries.source: Applies to the commands "Insert page before/after this page".
entries.translated: 适用于命令“在此页面之前/之后插入页面”。

entries.source: Keep labels unchanged
entries.translated: 保持标签不变

entries.source: Update
entries.translated: 更新

entries.source: Insert: ask whether to update
entries.translated: 插入：询问是否更新

entries.source: Delete: default page label processing
entries.translated: 删除：默认页面标签处理

entries.source: Applies to the command "Delete this page".
entries.translated: 适用于命令“删除此页面”。

entries.source: Delete: ask whether to update
entries.translated: 删除：询问是否更新

entries.source: Extract: default page label processing
entries.translated: 提取：默认页面标签处理

entries.source: Applies to the commands "Extract this page to a new file" and "Divide this PDF into two files at this page".
entries.translated: 适用于命令“将此页面提取到新文件”和“在此页面处将此PDF分成两个文件”。

entries.source: Extract: ask whether to update
entries.translated: 提取：询问是否更新

entries.source: Always record to history when opening PDF links
entries.translated: 打开PDF链接时始终记录到历史

entries.source: By default, the history is recorded only when you open a link to a different PDF file. If enabled, the history will be recorded even when you open a link to the same PDF file as the current one, and you will be able to go back and forth the history by clicking the left/right arrow buttons even within a single PDF file.
entries.translated: 默认情况下，仅当您打开指向不同PDF文件的链接时才会记录历史记录。如果启用此选项，即使您打开指向与当前文件相同的PDF文件的链接，也会记录历史记录，并且您可以通过单击左/右箭头按钮在单个PDF文件内来回浏览历史记录。

entries.source: Don't open a single PDF file in multiple tabs
entries.translated: 不要在多个标签页中打开同一个PDF文件

entries.source: Don't move focus to PDF viewer after opening a PDF link
entries.translated: 打开PDF链接后不要将焦点移至PDF查看器

entries.source: This option will be ignored when you open a PDF link in a tab in the same split as the PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 当您在PDF查看器同一分割区域内的标签页中打开PDF链接时，此选项将被忽略。

entries.source: When opening a link to an already opened PDF file, highlight the tab
entries.translated: 打开指向已打开PDF文件的链接时，高亮显示标签页

entries.source: Preserve the current zoom level when opening a link to an already opened PDF file
entries.translated: 打开指向已打开PDF文件的链接时保留当前缩放级别

entries.source: When you open a link to a PDF file that's already opened, Obsidian's default behavior causes the zoom level to be reset to fit the width of the PDF file to the viewer. If enabled, the current zoom level will be preserved. This option will be ignored in PDF embeds.
entries.translated: 当您打开指向已打开的PDF文件的链接时，Obsidian的默认行为会将缩放级别重置为适合PDF文件宽度以适应查看器。如果启用此选项，将保留当前缩放级别。此选项在PDF嵌入中将被忽略。

entries.source: Preserve the current horizontal scroll position
entries.translated: 保留当前水平滚动位置

entries.source: How to open PDF links when there is no open PDF file
entries.translated: 当没有打开的PDF文件时如何打开PDF链接

entries.source: Open PDF links next to an existing PDF tab
entries.translated: 在现有PDF标签页旁边打开PDF链接

entries.source: Open PDF link instead of showing popover preview when target PDF is already opened
entries.translated: 当目标PDF已打开时，打开PDF链接而非显示弹出预览

entries.source: Press ctrl while hovering a PDF link to actually open it if the target PDF is already opened in another tab.
entries.translated: 如果目标PDF已在另一个标签页中打开，将鼠标悬停在PDF链接上时按住Ctrl键以实际打开它。

entries.source: Open PDF links with an external app
entries.translated: 使用外部应用程序打开PDF链接

entries.source: Clear highlights after a certain amount of time
entries.translated: 在一定时间后清除高亮

entries.source: Highlight duration (sec)
entries.translated: 高亮持续时间（秒）

entries.source: Ignore "height" parameter in popover preview
entries.translated: 忽略弹出预览中的“height”参数

entries.source: Obsidian lets you specify the height of a PDF embed by appending "&height=..." to a link, and this also applies to popover previews. Enable this option if you want to ignore the height parameter in popover previews.
entries.translated: Obsidian允许您通过在链接后附加“&height=...”来指定PDF嵌入的高度，这也适用于弹出预览。如果您希望在弹出预览中忽略高度参数，请启用此选项。

entries.source: Double click PDF embeds to open links
entries.translated: 双击PDF嵌入以打开链接

entries.source: Double-clicking a PDF embed will open the embedded file.
entries.translated: 双击PDF嵌入将打开嵌入的文件。

entries.source: Trim selection/annotation embeds
entries.translated: 修剪选择/注释嵌入

entries.source: Hide sidebar in PDF embeds or PDF popover previews by default
entries.translated: 默认情况下在PDF嵌入或PDF弹出预览中隐藏侧边栏

entries.source: Don't display PDF embeds or PDF popover previews in "two page" layout
entries.translated: 不要在“双页”布局中显示PDF嵌入或PDF弹出预览

entries.source: Regardless of the "two page" layout setting in existing PDF viewer, PDF embeds and PDF popover previews will be always displayed in "single page" layout. You can still turn it on for each embed by clicking the "two page" button in the toolbar, if shown.
entries.translated: 无论现有PDF查看器中的“双页”布局设置如何，PDF嵌入和PDF弹出预览将始终以“单页”布局显示。您仍然可以通过单击工具栏中的“双页”按钮（如果显示）为每个嵌入启用它。

entries.source: Don't highlight text in text selection embeds
entries.translated: 不要在文本选择嵌入中高亮显示文本

entries.source: Don't highlight annotations in annotation embeds
entries.translated: 不要在注释嵌入中高亮显示注释

entries.source: Don't clear highlights in text selection embeds
entries.translated: 不要在文本选择嵌入中清除高亮

entries.source: Don't clear highlights in annotation embeds
entries.translated: 不要在注释嵌入中清除高亮

entries.source: Make PDF embeds with a page specified unscrollable
entries.translated: 使指定页面的PDF嵌入不可滚动

entries.source: After changing this option, you need to reopen tabs or reload the app.
entries.translated: 更改此选项后，您需要重新打开标签页或重新加载应用程序。

entries.source: Filter backlinks by page by default
entries.translated: 默认按页面筛选反向链接

entries.source: You can toggle this on and off with the "Show only backlinks in the current page" button at the top right of the backlinks pane.
entries.translated: 您可以通过反向链接窗格右上角的“仅显示当前页面中的反向链接”按钮切换此功能。

entries.source: Show backlinks to the entire page
entries.translated: 显示指向整个页面的反向链接

entries.source: If turned off, only backlinks to specific text selections, annotations or locations will be shown when filtering the backlinks page by page.
entries.translated: 如果关闭，按页面筛选反向链接时，仅显示指向特定文本选择、注释或位置的反向链接。

entries.source: Hover sync (PDF viewer → Backlinks pane)
entries.translated: 悬停同步（PDF查看器 → 反向链接窗格）

entries.source: Hovering your mouse over highlighted text or annotation will also highlight the corresponding item in the backlink pane.
entries.translated: 将鼠标悬停在高亮显示的文本或注释上也会高亮显示反向链接窗格中的相应项目。

entries.source: Hover sync (Backlinks pane → PDF viewer)
entries.translated: 悬停同步（反向链接窗格 → PDF查看器）

entries.source: In the backlinks pane, hover your mouse over an backlink item to highlight the corresponding text or annotation in the PDF viewer. This option requires reopening or switching tabs to take effect.
entries.translated: 在反向链接窗格中，将鼠标悬停在反向链接项目上以高亮显示PDF查看器中的相应文本或注释。此选项需要重新打开或切换标签页才能生效。

entries.source: Highlight color for hover sync (Backlinks pane → PDF viewer)
entries.translated: 悬停同步的高亮颜色（反向链接窗格 → PDF查看器）

entries.source: To add a new color, click the "+" button in the "highlight colors" setting above.
entries.translated: 要添加新颜色，请单击上方“高亮颜色”设置中的“+”按钮。

entries.source: PDF++ default
entries.translated: PDF++ 默认

entries.source: Search options
entries.translated: 搜索选项

entries.source: Case sensitive search
entries.translated: 区分大小写的搜索

entries.source: No
entries.translated: 否

entries.source: Follow default setting
entries.translated: 遵循默认设置

entries.source: Highlight all search results
entries.translated: 高亮显示所有搜索结果

entries.source: Match diacritics
entries.translated: 匹配变音符号

entries.source: Match whole word
entries.translated: 匹配整个单词

entries.source: Open PDF links with the OS-defined default application for PDF files.
entries.translated: 使用操作系统定义的PDF文件默认应用程序打开PDF链接。

entries.source: Sync the external app with Obsidian
entries.translated: 将外部应用程序与Obsidian同步

entries.source: When you focus on a PDF file in Obsidian, the external app will also focus on the same file.
entries.translated: 当您在Obsidian中聚焦于PDF文件时，外部应用程序也将聚焦于同一文件。

entries.source: Focus Obsidian after opening a PDF file with an external app
entries.translated: 使用外部应用程序打开PDF文件后将焦点移至Obsidian

entries.source: Otherwise, the focus will be moved to the external app.
entries.translated: 否则，焦点将移至外部应用程序。

entries.source: Sync page number
entries.translated: 同步页码

entries.source: Minimum update interval of the View Sync file (sec)
entries.translated: 视图同步文件的最小更新间隔（秒）

entries.source: Default location for new dummy PDF files
entries.translated: 新虚拟PDF文件的默认位置

entries.source: Where newly created dummy PDF files are placed. If set to "Same as Obsidian's attachment location", dummy files will be saved in the folder specified in Obsidian settings > Files and links > Default location for new attachments.
entries.translated: 新创建的虚拟PDF文件的存放位置。如果设置为“与Obsidian的附件位置相同”，虚拟文件将保存在Obsidian设置 > 文件与链接 > 新附件的默认位置中指定的文件夹中。

entries.source: Vault folder
entries.translated: 仓库文件夹

entries.source: Same folder as current file
entries.translated: 与当前文件相同的文件夹

entries.source: In the folder specified below
entries.translated: 在下面指定的文件夹中

entries.source: In subfolder under current folder
entries.translated: 在当前文件夹下的子文件夹中

entries.source: Same as Obsidian's attachment location
entries.translated: 与Obsidian的附件位置相同

entries.source: Dummy file folder path
entries.translated: 虚拟文件文件夹路径

entries.source: Place newly created dummy PDF files in this folder.
entries.translated: 将新创建的虚拟PDF文件放置在此文件夹中。

entries.source: Subfolder name
entries.translated: 子文件夹名称

entries.source: If your file is under "vault/folder", and you set subfolder name to "attachments", dummy PDF files will be saved to "vault/folder/attachments".
entries.translated: 如果您的文件位于“vault/folder”下，并且您将子文件夹名称设置为“attachments”，虚拟PDF文件将保存到“vault/folder/attachments”。

entries.source: Modifier key to create a dummy PDF file on drag & drop
entries.translated: 拖放时创建虚拟PDF文件的修饰键

entries.source: After dragging an external PDF file, drop it on the editor while pressing this modifier key to create a dummy file and insert a link to it. You can drag a URL to a PDF file on the web from within your browser (link, URL bar, bookmark, etc.) or a PDF file on your desktop machine from your file manager (File Explorer etc.). Note that on mobile, you might need to start pressing the modifier key before starting the drag operation.
entries.translated: 拖动外部PDF文件后，在按住此修饰键的同时将其拖放到编辑器上，以创建虚拟文件并插入指向它的链接。您可以从浏览器（链接、URL栏、书签等）中拖动指向网络上PDF文件的URL，或从文件管理器（文件资源管理器等）中拖动桌面计算机上的PDF文件。请注意，在移动设备上，您可能需要在开始拖动操作之前按住修饰键。

entries.source: Shift
entries.translated: Shift

entries.source: Ctrl
entries.translated: Ctrl

entries.source: Ctrl+Shift
entries.translated: Ctrl+Shift

entries.source: URI patterns for PDF files
entries.translated: PDF文件的URI模式

entries.source: Specify the URI pattens for PDFs in regular expressions. When dragging and dropping a URI/URL from your browser to Obsidian's editor, it will be used to check if the destination file is a PDF file. If you need multiple patterns, separate them with a new line.
entries.translated: 使用正则表达式指定PDF的URI模式。当从浏览器拖动URI/URL到Obsidian的编辑器时，将使用此模式检查目标文件是否为PDF文件。如果需要多个模式，请用换行符分隔它们。

entries.source: The default keybindings are as follows. You can customize them be creating a "vimrc" file and providing its path in the setting below.
entries.translated: 默认按键绑定如下。您可以通过创建“vimrc”文件并在下面的设置中提供其路径来自定义它们。

entries.source: Many of the commands above can be combined with counts. For example:
entries.translated: 上述许多命令可以与计数结合使用。例如：

entries.source: Reopen the PDF viewers after changing this option.
entries.translated: 更改此选项后重新打开PDF查看器。

entries.source: Vimrc file path (optional)
entries.translated: Vimrc文件路径（可选）

entries.source: Example (not necessarily recommendations):
entries.translated: 示例（不一定是推荐）：

entries.source: After changing the path or the file content, you need to reopen the PDF viewer. If the vimrc file is a hidden file or is under a hidden folder, you need to reload PDF++ or the app.
entries.translated: 更改路径或文件内容后，您需要重新打开PDF查看器。如果vimrc文件是隐藏文件或位于隐藏文件夹下，您需要重新加载PDF++或应用程序。

entries.source: Visual mode
entries.translated: 可视模式

entries.source: Use motion keys to adjust text selection
entries.translated: 使用移动键调整文本选择

entries.source: Tips:
entries.translated: 提示：

entries.source: Outline mode
entries.translated: 大纲模式

entries.source: Enter outline mode when opening PDF outline view
entries.translated: 打开PDF大纲视图时进入大纲模式

entries.source: Smooth motion in outline mode
entries.translated: 大纲模式下的平滑移动

entries.source: Command-line mode (experimental)
entries.translated: 命令行模式（实验性）

entries.source: Use arrow down/up keys to go back and forth the command history.
entries.translated: 使用向下/向上箭头键在命令历史记录中来回切换。

entries.source: Hint mode (experimental)
entries.translated: 提示模式（实验性）

entries.source: Also check out Style Settings > PDF++ > Vim keybindings > Hint mode.
entries.translated: 另请查看样式设置 > PDF++ > Vim按键绑定 > 提示模式。

entries.source: Characters to use in hint mode
entries.translated: 提示模式下使用的字符

entries.source: They are used preferentially from left to right, so you might want to put the easier-to-reach keys first. This is the same as Tridactyl's "hintchars" option.
entries.translated: 它们会优先从左到右使用，因此您可能希望将更容易按到的键放在前面。这与Tridactyl的“hintchars”选项相同。

entries.source: Default arguments for the ":hint" Ex command
entries.translated: “:hint” Ex命令的默认参数

entries.source: Space-separated list of "link"/"annot"/"backlink" or "all". Run ":help :hint" for the details.
entries.translated: 以空格分隔的“link”/“annot”/“backlink”或“all”列表。运行“:help :hint”查看详情。

entries.source: Context menu
entries.translated: 上下文菜单

entries.source: Enable Vim keys in PDF context menus
entries.translated: 在PDF上下文菜单中启用Vim键

entries.source: If enabled, you can use j/k/h/l keys, instead of the arrow keys, to navigate through context menu items in the PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 如果启用，您可以使用j/k/h/l键（而非方向键）在PDF查看器中导航上下文菜单项。

entries.source: Scrolling
entries.translated: 滚动

entries.source: Scroll size (px) of the jkhl keys
entries.translated: jkhl键的滚动大小（像素）

entries.source: The size of scroll when one of the jkhl keys is pressed once.
entries.translated: 按下jkhl键中任意一个键一次时的滚动大小。

entries.source: Increase scroll size when zoomed in
entries.translated: 放大时增加滚动大小

entries.source: Speed of continuous scroll (px per ms)
entries.translated: 连续滚动速度（像素/毫秒）

entries.source: The speed of scroll when pressing and holding down the jkhl keys.
entries.translated: 按住jkhl键时的滚动速度。

entries.source: Smooth scroll
entries.translated: 平滑滚动

entries.source: Search
entries.translated: 搜索

entries.source: hlsearch
entries.translated: 高亮搜索

entries.source: If enabled, all matches will be highlighted.
entries.translated: 如果启用，所有匹配项都将被高亮显示。

entries.source: incsearch
entries.translated: 增量搜索

entries.source: Incremental search: while typing the search query, update the search results after every keystroke. If disabled, the results will be shown only after pressing Enter.
entries.translated: 增量搜索：在输入搜索查询时，每次击键后更新搜索结果。如果禁用，则仅在按下Enter键后显示结果。

entries.source: Automatically check for updates
entries.translated: 自动检查更新

entries.source: If enabled, PDF++ will automatically check for updates every 24 hours and notify you if a new version is available.
entries.translated: 如果启用，PDF++将每24小时自动检查更新，并在有新版本可用时通知您。

entries.source: Fix Obsidian 1.9's text selection bug
entries.translated: 修复Obsidian 1.9的文本选择错误

entries.source: Show status in PDF toolbar
entries.translated: 在PDF工具栏中显示状态

entries.source: For example, when you copy a link to a text selection in a PDF file, the status "Link copied" will be displayed in the PDF toolbar.
entries.translated: 例如，当您复制PDF文件中文本选择的链接时，状态“链接已复制”将显示在PDF工具栏中。

entries.source: Default location for new PDFs
entries.translated: 新PDF的默认位置

entries.source: The "Create new PDF" command will create a new PDF file in the location specified here.
entries.translated: “创建新PDF”命令将在此处指定的位置创建新的PDF文件。

entries.source: Folder to create new PDFs in
entries.translated: 创建新PDF的文件夹

entries.source: Newly created PDFs will appear under this folder.
entries.translated: 新创建的PDF将出现在此文件夹下。

entries.source: Hide reply annotations
entries.translated: 隐藏回复注释

entries.source: Hide annotations that are replies to other annotations in the PDF viewer.
entries.translated: 在PDF查看器中隐藏作为其他注释回复的注释。

entries.source: This is a temporary fix for the issue that PDF.js (the library Obsidian's PDF viewer is based on) does not fulfill the PDF specification in that it renders reply annotations as if a standalone annotation.
entries.translated: 这是对PDF.js（Obsidian的PDF查看器所基于的库）未满足PDF规范的临时修复，因为它将回复注释渲染为独立注释。

entries.source: Disable popups for rubber stamp annotations
entries.translated: 禁用橡皮图章注释的弹出窗口

entries.source: A rubber stamp annotation is a type of annotation that displays text or graphics intended to look like a rubber stamp. However, some applications, including iOS/iPadOS's "Markup", use this type of annotation also for handwriting. Often, all pieces of handwriting in a single page are grouped into a single rubber stamp annotation, which tends to be so large that it covers the entire page. In this case, annotation popups can be annoying, so you can disable them here.
entries.translated: 橡皮图章注释是一种显示文本或图形以模拟橡皮图章外观的注释。然而，包括iOS/iPadOS的“标记”在内的一些应用程序也使用此类注释进行手写。通常，单个页面中的所有手写片段会被分组到一个橡皮图章注释中，该注释往往非常大，覆盖整个页面。在这种情况下，注释弹出窗口可能会很烦人，因此您可以在此处禁用它们。

entries.source: Remove half-width whitespace between two Chinese/Japanese characters when copying text
entries.translated: 复制文本时移除两个中/日文字符之间的半角空格

entries.source: Such whitespace can be introduced as a result of poor post-processing of OCR (optical character recognition). Enable this option to remove it when copying links to text selections.
entries.translated: 此类空格可能是由于OCR（光学字符识别）后处理不佳而引入的。启用此选项可在复制文本选择链接时移除它。

entries.source: Override the default copy behavior in the PDF viewer
entries.translated: 覆盖PDF查看器中的默认复制行为

entries.source: "PATH" environment variable
entries.translated: “PATH”环境变量

entries.source: Provide the "PATH" environment variable for PDF++ to run shell commands without the full paths specified. In MacOS and Linux, you can run "echo $PATH" in Terminal and then copy & paste the result here. Currently, it will be used only when you run ":!<command>" in Vim mode.
entries.translated: 为PDF++提供“PATH”环境变量，以便在不指定完整路径的情况下运行shell命令。在MacOS和Linux中，您可以在终端中运行“echo $PATH”，然后将结果复制并粘贴到此处。目前，它仅在您在Vim模式下运行“:!<command>”时使用。

entries.source: You can find more options in Style Settings > PDF++.
entries.translated: 您可以在样式设置 > PDF++中找到更多选项。

entries.source: Open style settings
entries.translated: 打开样式设置

entries.source: If you find PDF++ helpful, please consider supporting the development to help me keep this plugin alive. If you prefer PayPal, please make donations via Ko-fi. Thank you!
entries.translated: 如果您觉得PDF++有帮助，请考虑支持开发，以帮助我保持此插件的活力。如果您更喜欢PayPal，请通过Ko-fi进行捐赠。谢谢！

entries.source: GitHub Sponsors
entries.translated: GitHub赞助者

entries.source: Buy Me a Coffee
entries.translated: 请我喝杯咖啡

entries.source: Ko-fi
entries.translated: Ko-fi
